info.description: Retrieves positions due to different transactions in a particular currency
info.title: API to retrieve position information across all the treasury products in a particular currency

get.summary: Retrieves cash inflow and outflow positions
get.description: Retrieves information from different transactions affecting the cash inflow/outflow, along with the projected cashflow data and arranges them into different time buckets as configured by the institution.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Indicates the type of currency to which the account belongs

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: currencyMarket
parameters.description: Identifies the currency market to be used to get the correct exchange and revaluation rates to be applied to each currency

parameters.name: calendar
parameters.description: Identifies the calendar to be used for the spreading of different position data into different time buckets. Ex: CAL-Standard calendar and DE1-Deutsche calendar

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.summary: Retrieves the mark to market revaluation of foreign exchange positions.
